author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tense moments prevailed after a New College student, Mahaveer (18), travelling on the footboard of an MTC bus fell down and died on Anna Salai on Friday. Students staying with him at SC/ST hostel staged a protest. Subsequently, the MTC driver, Abraham, was arrested.

Students stage

a demonstration demanding the MTC driver's arrest
title: Student’s fatal fall from footboard sparks protest
